LayoutNode.Content: Can you ship it?
LayoutNode.SRC: Can you ship it?

LayoutNode.Content: Can you mail alcohol? Beer? Cigarettes? Fruits and vegetables? If you have any questions about whether or not the contents of your shipment can be shipped by USPS®, consult the lists ofprohibited and restricted items below. The lists are not exhaustive, so if you’re looking for information not covered below, please refer to the resources available under Helpful Links.
LayoutNode.SRC: Can you mail alcohol? Beer? Cigarettes? Fruits and vegetables? If you have any questions about whether or not the contents of your shipment can be shipped by USPS®, consult the lists of prohibited and restricted items below. The lists are not exhaustive, so if you’re looking for information not covered below, please refer to the resources available under Helpful Links.

LayoutNode.Content: All prohibited domestic items are also prohibited from being shipped internationally. However, some items that are prohibited from being shipped internationally can shipped domestically, withsome restrictions.
LayoutNode.SRC: All prohibited domestic items are also prohibited from being shipped internationally. However, some items that are prohibited from being shipped internationally can shipped domestically, with some restrictions.

LayoutNode.SRC: Prohibited Domestic Items

  • Ammunition
  • Explosives
  • Gasoline
  • Marijuana (medical or otherwise)

LayoutNode.Content: Tobacco Restrictions Expand All Tips for… Collapse All
LayoutNode.SRC:
Tobacco Restrictions

Expand All Tips for…Collapse All

LayoutNode.Content: Cigars Expand Collapse FAQ question Cigars may be mailed domestically. They may also be shipped internationally unless the country you are shipping to prohibits it.
LayoutNode.SRC:
Cigars ExpandCollapse FAQ question

Cigars may be mailed domestically. They may also be shipped internationally unless the country you are shipping to prohibits it.

LayoutNode.Content: APO/FPO/DPO Expand Collapse FAQ question Tobacco products may be mailed to APO/FPO/DPO locations where tobacco items are allowed. Tobacco Product Shipments to APO/FPO/DPO
LayoutNode.SRC:
APO/FPO/DPO ExpandCollapse FAQ question

Tobacco products may be mailed to APO/FPO/DPO locations where tobacco items are allowed.

Tobacco Product Shipments to APO/FPO/DPO

LayoutNode.Content: Business & Regulatory Agencies Expand Collapse FAQ question
LayoutNode.SRC: Business & Regulatory Agencies ExpandCollapse FAQ question

LayoutNode.Content: Tobacco products may be mailed between verified and authorized tobacco industry businesses and federal or state agencies. An eligibility letter and return receipt are required. Guidelines for Business and Regulatory Mailings About Business Purposes Exception Application Business/Regulatory Purpose Exception Application (PDF | .5 MB)
LayoutNode.SRC:
Tobacco products may be mailed between verified and authorized tobacco industry businesses and federal or state agencies. An eligibility letter and return receipt are required.

Guidelines for Business and Regulatory MailingsAbout Business Purposes Exception ApplicationBusiness/Regulatory Purpose Exception Application (PDF | .5 MB)

LayoutNode.Content: Age–Verified Individuals Expand Collapse FAQ question Certain individual exception mailings must be presented to a postal employee in a face-to-face transaction. Guidelines for Individual Exceptions Mailings
LayoutNode.SRC:
Age–Verified Individuals ExpandCollapse FAQ question

Certain individual exception mailings must be presented to a postal employee in a face-to-face transaction.

Guidelines for Individual Exceptions Mailings

LayoutNode.Content: Cigarettes & Smokeless Tobacco Expand Collapse FAQ question Most cigarettes and smokeless tobacco products may not be mailed domestically or internationally.
LayoutNode.SRC: Cigarettes & Smokeless Tobacco ExpandCollapse FAQ questionMost cigarettes and smokeless tobacco products may not be mailed domestically or internationally.

LayoutNode.Content: Exceptions for Mailing Cigarette & Smokeless Tobacco Expand Collapse FAQ question
LayoutNode.SRC: Exceptions for Mailing Cigarette & Smokeless Tobacco ExpandCollapse FAQ question

LayoutNode.Content: Sometimes individuals may ship cigarettes and smokeless tobacco. Mailing Cigarettes and Smokeless Tobacco Products When you have an allowable cigarette or smokeless tobacco shipment, you must have your package approved by a Postal employee at a Post Office™. All allowable cigarette shipments must have a unique marking on the address side of the package. Each type of shipping exception has its own marking. Find a Post Office Using Click-N-Ship® Even if you create an address label using Click-N-Ship, you must take your package to the Post Office to mail. You may not put the package in a mailbox or leave it out for your mail carrier. Check Cigarette or Smokeless Tobacco Eligibility General Mailability Guidelines Exceptions for Certain Individuals Tobacco Shipments to APO/FPO/DPO Exception for Business/Regulatory Purposes Consumer Testing Exception
LayoutNode.SRC:
Sometimes individuals may ship cigarettes and smokeless tobacco.

Mailing Cigarettes and Smokeless Tobacco ProductsWhen you have an allowable cigarette or smokeless tobacco shipment, you must have your package approved by a Postal employee at a Post Office™.All allowable cigarette shipments must have a unique marking on the address side of the package. Each type of shipping exception has its own marking.Find a Post OfficeUsing Click-N-Ship®Even if you create an address label using Click-N-Ship, you must take your package to the Post Office to mail. You may not put the package in a mailbox or leave it out for your mail carrier.Check Cigarette or Smokeless Tobacco EligibilityGeneral Mailability GuidelinesExceptions for Certain IndividualsTobacco Shipments to APO/FPO/DPOException for Business/Regulatory PurposesConsumer Testing Exception

LayoutNode.Content: Alaska & Hawaii Expand Collapse FAQ question Tobacco products may be mailed as long as the shipments stay entirely within Alaska or Hawaii. Mailing within Noncontiguous States
LayoutNode.SRC:
Alaska & Hawaii ExpandCollapse FAQ question

Tobacco products may be mailed as long as the shipments stay entirely within Alaska or Hawaii.

Mailing within Noncontiguous States

LayoutNode.Content: Return Receipts Expand Collapse FAQ question
LayoutNode.SRC: Return Receipts ExpandCollapse FAQ question

LayoutNode.Content: Each business or regulatory agency and consumer and public health testing facility must have a Return Receipt (PS Form 3811) with their shipment returnable to the PCSC PACT MailingOffice.
LayoutNode.SRC: Each business or regulatory agency and consumer and public health testing facility must have a Return Receipt (PS Form 3811) with their shipment returnable to the PCSC PACT Mailing Office.
